video.title: Awake
video.synopsis: After surviving a car crash, detective Michael Britten travels between different versions of reality, being forced to grasp two versions of his life.

episodes.synopsis: After a car crash involving his family, Det. Michael Britten lives in two worlds: one in which his wife survives, the other in which his son survives.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: The height of a suspect becomes an important clue in both of Michael's realities, and a disturbing new light is shed on the Britten family car crash.
episodes.title: The Little Guy

episodes.synopsis: Michael's son, Rex, is kidnapped by a criminal out for revenge. Meanwhile, Hannah is angry at Michael for missing a memorial service.
episodes.title: Guilty

episodes.synopsis: Kate, one of Rex's former babysitters, figures prominently in cases that straddle both of Michael's worlds.
episodes.title: Kate Is Enough

episodes.synopsis: Michael goes on the hunt for a serial killer and becomes a suspect himself, and Hannah considers moving to Oregon for a fresh start.
episodes.title: Oregon

episodes.synopsis: While negotiating with a disturbed man who has taken hostages in a mental hospital, Michael begins to have strange visions of penguins.
episodes.title: That's Not My Penguin

episodes.synopsis: Michael investigates a murder and a suicide in his different worlds, and a mysterious voice at a fast-food drive thru warns him not to move to Oregon.
episodes.title: Ricky's Tacos

episodes.synopsis: While helping a couple in league with the mob settle into a witness protection program, Michael gets ready for his new life in Oregon with Hannah.
episodes.title: Nightswimming

episodes.synopsis: A high-profile college football game has different outcomes in Michael's two realities, with each one leading to violence and a death.
episodes.title: Game Day

episodes.synopsis: Evidence in one reality casts doubt on a murder case in the other, and as they prepare to move to Oregon, Michael and Hannah reach out to Emma.
episodes.title: Slack Water

episodes.synopsis: Michael becomes erratic when he gets stuck in just one of his realities. Meanwhile, Hannah tries to help Emma mend fences with her family.
episodes.title: Say Hello to My Little Friend

episodes.synopsis: When Michael discovers that there was a conspiracy behind his family's fatal car crash, he seeks revenge against Det. Hawkins.
episodes.title: Two Birds

episodes.synopsis: Michael's two realities begin to collide as he works to expose the conspirators, who in turn are hunting for him.
episodes.title: Turtles All the Way Down
